@AggregateRoot Entity Annotation.description: Marks an entity as "aggregate root" (useful to define "DDD aggregates" )

@Context() Entity Annotation.description: Defines the context to which the entity belongs

@DbCatalog() Entity Annotation.description: Defines the database catalog to which the entity table belongs

@DbComment() attribute & Entity Annotati.description: The comment in the database (typically a column comment or table comment in a relational database)

@DbSchema() Entity Annotation.description: Defines the database schema to which the entity table belongs

@DbTable() Entity Annotation.description: Defines the database table associated with the entity

@DbTablespace() Entity Annotation.description: Defines the database tablespace where the entity table is located

@DbView Entity Annotation.description: Marks the entity as a "view" in the database

@Domain() Entity Annotation.description: Defines the "domain" to which the entity belongs

@InMemoryRepository Entity Annotation.description: Marks an entity as fully stored in memory. All occurrences can be accessed directly in memory (can be useful for static datasets).

@Package() Entity Annotation.description: Defines the "package" to which the entity belongs
